attributes.action: Laws to stop Brain Hacking and Harrasment through Wifi and Radio waves
attributes.additional_details: There are million of people including kids and women who are using smart phone and tablets every day.Where this technology bring benefits,it brings risk to health and life as well from skin cancer to brain demange,stress and depression it.It is so easy that anybody with a brain software and radio signals can attach to yours brain and hack into yours personal life.In USA Nasa was sued in courts for hacking civilain brains and thier private life.The same patterns started here in  UK where some people i.e government departments abusing this technology and doing dangerious brain experiments on civilians.I witness myself and reported to poilce but nothing happended.We need lawys to protects people from this modern technology crimes.

rejection.details:
It did not have a clear statement explaining what action you want the government to take.

Additionally, you must provide your full names. Thank you.
